raw_comment: I noticed that the "First leaf" arches to the west coast of america except for the "First leaf" in May. The "First leaf" in May was a big clump in the middle of the west and little parts scattered on other places of the U.S.
ace_sentences: I noticed a pattern of the "First leaf".
The "First leaf" arches to the west coast of America.
This is true except for the "First leaf" in May.
The "First leaf" in May was a big clump in the middle of the west of the U.S.
The "First leaf" in May also had little parts.
These little parts were scattered in other places of the U.S.
